<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2169) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 69</row>

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

As part of daily preparation, you can drill with a number of allies up to your Charisma modifier. These allies must be present and listening during this time, but this does not otherwise impede their own preparation. When you use this feat's benefit, you and all drilled companions within 30 feet who are wielding shields [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98). Allies who Raise their Shields keep them raised until the start of their next turn, as normal.

<title level="2">Knights in Training</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 68</row>

The following feats represent benefits of training from the Iomedars (Kalabrynne for knight vigilant, Clarethe for knight reclaimant, either for Lastwall sentry).

**Related Feats**: [Rescuer's Press](/Feats.aspx?ID=2167), [Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout](/Feats.aspx?ID=2168)
name: Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!
